Renegade Weapons Bundle: Locked and Loaded
kDesc

Contains the full set of all 9 Renegade weapons for No Man's Land, this bundle comes with the following items: 
 
 1. Dagger B-4 Semi-automatic Pistol - Renegade 
 2. Styx-Lethe T-67 Automatic Pistol - Renegade 
 3. Kretsky Anvil Revolver - Renegade 
 4. Kretsky Slugger Assault Rifle - Renegade 
 5. Wulff C-6 Carnivore Assault Rifle - Renegade 
 6. Styx-Lethe Grinder Machine Gun - Renegade 
 7. Kretsky Leviathan Machine Gun - Renegade 
 8. Machete M-C3 Sniper Rifle - Renegade 
 9. Kretsky KS-9 Sniper Rifle - Renegade [#Legal]

Ce pack complet, qui contient les 9 armes Renegade pour No Man's Land, est fourni avec les éléments suivants : 
 
 1. Pistolet semi-automatique Dagger B-4 - Renegade 
 2. Pistolet automatique Styx & Lethe T-67 - Renegade 
 3. Revolver Kretsky Anvil - Renegade 
 4. Fusil d'assaut Kretsky Slugger - Renegade 
 5. Fusil d'assaut Wulff C-6 Carnivore - Renegade 
 6. Mitrailleuse Styx & Lethe Grinder - Renegade 
 7. Mitrailleuse Kretsky Leviathan - Renegade 
 8. Fusil de précision Machette M-C3 - Renegade 
 9. Fusil de précision Kretsky KS-9 - Renegade [#Legal]

Enthält das komplette Set aller 9 Renegade-Waffen for No Man's Land. Dieses Bündel umfasst die folgenden Artikel: 
 
 1. Dagger B-4 Halbautomatische Pistole - Renegade 
 2. Styx & Lethe T-67 Automatische Pistole - Renegade 
 3. Kretsky Anvil Revolver - Renegade 
 4. Kretsky Slugger Sturmgewehr - Renegade 
 5. Wulff C-6 Carnivore Sturmgewehr - Renegade 
 6. Styx & Lethe Grinder Maschinegewehr - Renegade 
 7. Kretsky Leviathan Maschinengewehr - Renegade 
 8. Machete M-C3 Scharfschützengewehr - Renegade 
 9. Kretsky KS-9 Scharfschützengewehr - Renegade [#Legal]

Contiene tutte e 9 le armi Renegade per No Man's Land. Il set è composto dai seguenti elementi: 
 
 1. Pistola semiautomatica Dagger B-4 - Renegade 2. Pistola automatica T-67 Styx & Lethe - Renegade 
 3. Revolver Kretsky Anvil - Renegade 
 4. Fucile mitragliatore Kretsky Slugger - Renegade 
 5. Fucile mitragliatore Wulff C-6 Carnivore - Renegade 
 6. Mitragliatrice Grinder Styx & Lethe - Renegade 
 7. Mitragliatrice Kretsky Leviathan - Renegade 
 8. Fucile di precisione Machete M-C3 - Renegade 
 9. Fucile di precisione Kretsky KS-9 - Renegade [#Legal]

Contiene el set completo de 9 armas Renegade para No Man's Land, y consta de los artículos siguientes: 
 
 1. Dagger B-4 Pistola semiautomática - Renegade 
 2. Styx & Lethe T-67 Pistola automática - Renegade 
 3. Kretsky Anvil Revólver - Renegade 
 4. Kretsky Slugger Rifle de asalto - Renegade 
 5. Wulff C-6 Carnivore Rifle de asalto - Renegade 
 6. Styx & Lethe Grinder Ametralladora - Renegade 
 7. Kretsky Leviathan Ametralladora - Renegade 
 8. Machete M-C3 Rifle Francotirador - Renegade 
 9. Kretsky KS-9 Rifle Francotirador - Renegade [#Legal]

No Man's Land를 위한 9개의 레네게이드 무기 세트입니다. 이 번들은 아래의 아이템을 포함합니다: 
 
 1. 대거 B-4 반자동 권총 - 레네게이드 
 2. 스틱스-레테 T-67 자동 권총 - 레네게이드 
 3. 크레츠키 모루 리볼버 - 레네게이드 
 4. 크레츠키 슬러거 돌격소총 - 레네게이드 
 5. 울프 C-6 포식자 돌격소총 - 레네게이드 
 6. 스틱스-레테 분쇄기 기관총 - 레네게이드 
 7. 크레츠키 리바이어던 기관총 - 레네게이드 
 8. 마세티 M-C3 저격소총 - 레네게이드 
 9. 크레츠키 KS-9 저격소총 - 레네게이드 [#Legal]
